pages.text: $(l)Version 0.2.3 of the Plants vs Zombies mod$() updates $(borange)Halloween-related$() content, adding a Halloween zombie invasion type. On the day of the Halloween invasion, $(bred)trick zombies and pumpkin zombies$() will spawn. Killing them will has probability of dropping $(bpurple)candy$().

pages.title: Chocolate Recipe
pages.text: In general, $(borange)Chocolate$() is difficult to obtain, but if you have $(bpurple)Candy$(), you can directly craft it.
